original_text: Then from his mouth the serpent spewed water like a river, to overtake the woman and sweep her away with the torrent.
korean_text: 여자의 뒤에서 뱀이 그 입으로 물을 강 같이 토하여 여자를 물에 떠내려 가게 하려 하되

sentences.original_text: Then from his mouth the serpent spewed water like a river
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 뱀은 입에서 강물처럼 물을 토해냈다

sentences.original_text: and sweep her away with the torrent
